info.author: Ali RajabNezhad
info.description:
# Panther
<hr/>

## Requirements
```console
Python 3.10+
```

<hr/>

## Installation

- ### Create Virtual Environment

    ```concole
    $ python -m venv .venv
    ```

- ### Active The Environment

    * Linux & Mac
      ```concole
      $ source .venv/bin/activate
      ```
      
    * Windows
      ```concole
      $ .\.venv\Scripts\activate
      ```

- ### Install Panther

    ```console
    $ pip install panter
    ```
<hr/>

## Usage
- #### Create Project

    ```console
    $ panther create <project_name>
    ```

- #### Run Project

    ```console
    $ panther run 
    ```
  
- #### Monitoring Requests

    ```console
    $ panther monitor 
    ```

- #### Python Shell

    ```console
    $ panther shell 
    ```
